title: WORD_AS_STRING (Function)
text:
FUNCTION WORD_AS_STRING : STRING(2)
Converts one word into its ASCII string representation
Example:
Input
:
'16#48_46'
Byte
order
:
FALSE
->
String
:
'FH'

rows.Name: WORD_AS_STRING
rows.Comment: A STRING(2) representing the HEX code of the inputW

rows: TRUE: Swaps high and low byte
